title: Burundi Industrial Production
description: Industrial Production in Burundi increased 15.70 percent in June of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Industrial Production in Burundi averaged 4.26 percent from 2011 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 34.70 percent in June of 2011 and a record low of -29 percent in May of 2015. In Burundi, industrial production measures the output of businesses integrated in industrial sector of the economy such as manufacturing, mining, and utilities. This page provides - Burundi Industrial Production - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Burundi
